text: Uye mufananidzo weavo vanoshandisa hupfumi hwavo vachitsvaga mufaro waAllah nekuzvitsigira pachavo uye vachiziva kuti Allah vachavapa mubairo, mufananidzo wemunda uri panzvimbo yakakwirira ine ivhu rakakora, wonaiwa nemvura yakawanda, nokudaro wopa goho rakapetwa kaviri. Uyezve kana usina kuwana mvura zhinji, mvura shoma unoukwanira. Uye Allah vanoona zvese zvamunoita
